summary: A collection of utility functions that compute common recommendation system evaluation metrics such as ranking precision, recall, hit rate, normalized discounted cumulative gain, mean average precision, area under the ROC curve, and F1 score. These helpers are intended to assess the performance of collaborative filtering models like NGCF.
business_intent: Enable quantitative assessment of recommender model quality by providing ready‑to‑use calculations for ranking‑based metrics, facilitating model comparison and validation in production or research pipelines.
